title: How to Get the Last Shortening Out of a Container

steps.headline: Fill the container with boiling water.
Wait for the shortening to rise to the top of the cooled water.
Spoon it out from the top and use as needed.
Pour the remaining water out and you will have a clean container for recycling!

text: Fill the container with boiling water.  Leave it to cool.  Wait for the shortening to rise to the top of the cooled water.  Spoon it out from the top and use as needed.  Pour the remaining water out and you will have a clean container for recycling!
